properties.name: geocode.cache.path
properties.description: Filesystem path used for cached GeoNames downloads.

properties.name: geocode.geonames.url
properties.description: GeoNames download URL for the cities5000 dataset.

properties.name: geocode.geonames.refresh-in-days
properties.description: Number of days before refreshing the cached GeoNames download.

properties.name: geocode.geonames.extracted-file-name
properties.description: Expected filename of the cities dataset inside the GeoNames zip archive.

properties.name: geocode.maxmind.refresh-in-days
properties.description: Number of days before refreshing the cached MaxMind download.

properties.name: geocode.maxmind.database-file-name
properties.description: Expected database filename inside the MaxMind archive.
